mapper.select: /* 고정지급금 내역 출력 쿼리문 */ SELECT f.pay_fixedAllowance_list, f.fixedAllowance, f.amount, f.contents FROM tb_pay_fixedallowance_list AS f
/* 공제액 내역 출력 쿼리문 */ SELECT d.pay_deduction_list, d.deduction, d.amount, d.contents FROM tb_pay_deduction_list AS d
mapper.insert: /* 급여세팅값 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_pay_setting ( paySet_code, paySet_date, paySet_time, fixedPay_list, fixedPay_amount, deductionPay_list, deductionPay_amount, paySet_regDate ) VALUES ( sf_paySetCode(), #{paySetDate}, #{paySetTime}, #{fixedPayList}, #{fixedPayAmount}, #{deductionPayList}, #{deductionPayAmount}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: /* 급여세팅값 조회 */ SELECT s.paySet_date, s.paySet_time, s.fixedPay_list, s.fixedPay_amount, s.deductionPay_list, s.deductionPay_amount, s.paySet_regDate FROM tb_pay_setting AS s ORDER BY s.paySet_code DESC LIMIT 1

mapper.insert: /* 급여내역 등록 */ INSERT INTO tb_pay_payadd ( payAdd_code, emply_name, emply_id, emply_rank, emply_organization, basic_pay, fixedPay_list, bonus_pay, deductionPay_list, total_deduction, total_payment, payAdd_regDate ) VALUES ( sf_payAddCode(), #{emplyName}, #{emplyId}, #{emplyRank}, #{emplyOrganization}, #{basicPay}, #{fixedPayList}, #{bonusPay}, #{deductionPayList}, #{totalDeduction}, #{totalPayment}, CURDATE() );
